turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: small.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want a short?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Soy milk. Yeah, I want soy soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and for the size, did you want short?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering a short cappachino with soy milk, is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, right. You are correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i place that order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a short cappachino with soy milk to be picked up at the starbucks in westlake, daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: or mornings, is that correct? Yes, correct. That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nothing else.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.
